Audio.Locality: Pousada Caiman, Matto Grosso do Sul state
Audio.Author: Daniel Lane
Audio.Comments: Song (after playback) from understory of grazed deciduous woodland near open campo. Playback was from 'S. gujanensis' in San Martin, Peru, birds flew right in immediately upon playback. Perched about 2-3m off ground (family group of 3-4 individuals). Same birds as previous cut.
